meanings.definition: Skill in planning and executing deceitful schemes; cunning.
meanings.sent1: Her craftiness in tricking her friends was unmatched.
meanings.sent2: The fox's craftiness helped him outsmart the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The craftiness of the magician made the audience gasp in surprise.
meanings.sent4: His craftiness in negotiations was like a spider spinning a web of lies.
meanings.sent5: The craftiness of the spy was so sharp, it cut through any suspicion.

meanings.definition: The quality of being skilled in a particular craft or activity.
meanings.sent1: His craftiness in woodworking was evident in the intricate designs he created.
meanings.sent2: The craftiness of the seamstress was admired by all who saw her work.
meanings.sent3: The craftiness of the chef in creating new dishes was a delight to the taste buds.
meanings.sent4: Her craftiness in painting brought life to the canvas like magic.
meanings.sent5: The craftiness of the potter transformed clay into beautiful pottery.
